title: Software Developer – AI Trainer
description: I generate diverse coding challenges to train AI chatbots, covering multiple programming paradigms and languages such as Python, C++, JavaScript, and React, while also crafting clear and accurate responses to simulate real-world coding interactions and conducting comprehensive assessments of AI-generated code for accuracy, efficiency, and adherence to requirements.

title: Implementation Intern
description:
Provided ongoing technical support for troubleshooting and optimization with Trulioo’s REST API to support client developer teams throughout onboarding process.
Established SOPs for internal processes and developed external resources for product and API testing.
Collaborated across teams on product testing/feedback, QA, and client due diligence.
Leveraged programming skills to test SDK compatibility with React and automate tasks with Python.

title: Warehouse Associate
description:
Managed incoming and outgoing shipments between warehouses, stores, vendors, and customers.
Monitored inventory and logged data into inventory management software.
Resolved issues and concerns directly with customers regarding product shipments and deliveries.
Installed products and systems in customers’ homes and businesses.
